titleStmt.title: A form, or order of thanksgiving. And prayer, to be used in London, and ten miles round on Sunday the 15th of this instant January, and throughout England on Sunday the 29th of the same month, by all parsons, vicars, and curats in their respective parish churches, and chapels, in behalf of the King, and the Queen and the Royal Family, upon occasion of the Queen's being with child. By His Majesties special command.
titleStmt.author: Church of England.

notesStmt.note: Place of publication suggested by Wing.
Imperfect: faded print with slight loss of text.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
